title: Pitch Deck
text:
What is the Academy
        -
      
      We are an association of instructors committed to advancing education in statistics and machine learning.
    
    
      
        Our mission
        -
      
      We operate on different fronts:
        
          
            Supporting early-career astronomers in identifying and mastering analysis tools they may only know superficially, or have previously struggled to learn without structured guidance.
          
          
            Preparing additional personnel to become instructors and assisting with the organization of teaching events.
          
        
      
    
  
  
  In a few words, we allow students to grow:
  
  
    
  

  
    
      
        Our schools
        -
      
      Leveraging years of experience, the field knowledge of our instructors, and a carefully orchestrated curriculum supported by refined lectures, we have created a robust and well-tested teaching experience - enter the AstroStatistics School!

title: The AstroStat Academy in a nutshell
text:
Are you an astronomer feeling your knowledge of Statistics is not enough?
    
    
  

  
    
      Are you familiar with Machine Learning but are looking to demystify this "black box"?
    
    
  



  
    You are in luck!
  
  The AstroStat Academy is here to help!


  The Academy
  Bravo
  Charlie
